title: I lost double the rp that i spent on a skin!
body:
Dear Riot,
        Today i got 25 dollars worth of rp from a giftcard and decided to buy myself gangster twitch. I started with 2550ish, but dropped to 616ish
This is unfair as it acts as I spent double the amount of rp and i can't buy mafia jinx, another skin i wanted 2 get. I haven't used the skin yet, so if you could please refund or do something so i can get either my full amount of rp or have the amount im suppose to have

replies.body: Try relogging.  I see you were only charged for the skin once, so this is probably just a visual error.
